historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 21-2095.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-204, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-2091.

For Law 16-205, see notes following § 21-2091.

For Law 17-353, see notes following § 21-2091.

Miscellaneous Notes

D.C. Law 17-353, § 308, made a technical correction in the repeal of this section by D.C. Law 16-205, § 3(b).

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act. See 8A Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 21-2095

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Fiduciary Relations and Persons with Mental Illness. (Refs & Annos)
